structures.name: Verse-Chorus (common in POP music)
structures.definition: Verse - Chorus - Verse - Chorus - Bridge - Chorus

structures.name: Verse-Chorus-Bridge (Like in Rock Music)
structures.definition: Intro - Verse - Chorus - Verse - Chorus - Solo - Bridge - Chorus - Outro

structures.name: Storytelling (Like in Folk Music)
structures.definition: Intro - Verse - Verse - Chorus - Verse - Verse - Chorus - Outro

structures.name: Complex (often used for Heavy Metal)
structures.definition: Intro - Verse - Chorus - Verse - Chorus - Bridge - Solo - Chorus - Outro

structures.name: Simple and Fast
structures.definition: Intro - Verse - Chorus - Verse - Chorus - Solo - Chorus - Outro

structures.name: Verse-Chorus with Bridge (e.g. in R1B or soul)
structures.definition: Verse - Chorus - Verse - Chorus - Bridge - Chorus - Outro

structures.name: Verse-Break-Verse (e.g. as in Hip-Hop and Rap)
structures.definition: Intro - Verse - Hook - Verse - Hook - Bridge - Hook - Outro

structures.name: 12-Bar Blues
structures.definition: A repeating 12-bar pattern, for example: AAB pattern where each section is 4 bars, with a specific chord progression.

structures.name: Groove-Centric
structures.definition: Intro - Verse - Chorus - Verse - Chorus - Bridge - Chorus - Outro

structures.name: Dance-Focused
structures.definition: Intro - Verse - Chorus - Verse - Chorus - Bridge - Instrumental - Chorus - Outro

structures.name: Varied (like in Indie Rock)
structures.definition: Intro - Verse - Pre-Chorus - Chorus - Verse - Pre-Chorus - Chorus - Bridge - Chorus - Outro
